mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from air_board order by write_no desc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
mapper.update: update air_board set hit=hit+1 where write_no = #{writeNo}
update air_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where write_no = #{writeNo}

select.if: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from air_board where title like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by write_no desc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from air_board where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by write_no desc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
